wikipedia_page.main: Donald Ashley Gordon (born 3 October 1990) is an English cricketer.  Gordon is a right-handed batsman who bowls right-arm fast-medium.  He was born on the Isle of Wight and educated at Ryde School.While studying for his degree in mathematics at Keble College, Oxford, Gordon made his first-class debut for Oxford MCCU against Lancashire in 2011.  He made two further first-class appearances for the team in that season, against Nottinghamshire and Sussex.  In his matches in 2011, he took 5 wickets at an average of 49.40, with best figures of 2/27.
